mapper.select: select * from suho_reward order by name
mapper.insert: insert into suho_reward (reward_id, name, description, legend_id, price, img) values (suho_reward_seq.nextval, #{name}, #{description}, #{legend_id}, #{price}, #{img})
mapper.update: update suho_reward set name = #{name}, description = #{description}, legend_id = #{legend_id}, price = #{price}, img = #{img} where reward_id = #{reward_id}
